title: Multi-Agent System Infrastructure Discovery
description: Mapped complete multi-agent development system: TaskMaster SQLite database (11 active tasks across 3 agents), PM2 orchestration, agent specialization (Frontend, Backend, Testing), WebSocket API (port 3001), dashboard UI (port 5173), and master coordinator (port 3002). Discovered distributed task routing, branch-based agent operation, and comprehensive monitoring. System fully operational with institutional knowledge preservation.
